reviews.comments: Fantastische Villa, direkt am See, mit stilvolle Ausrichtung.

listing.name: New! EXCLUSIV VILLA direct at the LAKE of Zürich

reviews.comments: Super Lage, super Kommunikation, sehr freundliche Gastgeberin

listing.name: New! EXCLUSIV VILLA direct at the LAKE of Zürich

reviews.comments: Tolle und geschmackvolle Villa direkt am schönen Zürichsee. gepflegt und geschmackvoll. Ideal für 8-10 Personen. Perfekt für ein Familienfest. Mit dem Boot kann man Ankern vor dem Haus.

listing.name: New! EXCLUSIV VILLA direct at the LAKE of Zürich

reviews.comments:
Wer hier ein paar Tage verbringen darf, hat es ins Paradies geschafft. Die Villa bietet so unglaublich viel Platz und ist sehr stillvoll eingerichtet. Die Aussicht ist traumhaft und einzigartig. Für ein Familienfest oder einfach zur Erholung das perfekte Haus.
Der Garten lädt zum herumtollen ein für Kinder, es gibt mehrere Möglichkeiten den See zu geniessen und wer den Luxus liebt, ist hier genau richtig.

listing.name: New! EXCLUSIV VILLA direct at the LAKE of Zürich

name: ZÜRICH Amazing UNIQUE new built 5StarLAKE property
Cozy Exhibition Room in Winterthur
3-Zimmer Wohnung mit Seesicht

reviews.comments: Room in a beautiful house situated in quiet location near the train station. Rut is a very friendly, welcoming and helpful host. Definitely recommend!
the best place and host You can imagine!

Ich habe über 1 Monat bei Rut gewohnt. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt,  am Ende fast wie Zuhause.  Rut ist eine sehr nette,  freundliche und aufmerksame Dame.  Das Zimmer ist nicht sehr groß, aber gemütlich . Bei gutem Wetter kann man sehr schön auf die Terrasse entspannen. 
Ich werde Rut und " Katze" bald wieder besuchen.  Ich bedanke mich herzlich für die Gastfreundlichkeit. 
Georgeta

Die Unterkunft ist top und absolut für 1 Person weiter zu empfehlen. 
Rut ist eine super angenehme Gastgeberin. 
Wäre gerne auch länger geblieben. 
Ihre Katze ist zudem ein richtiges Kuscheltier!!! 
Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt.

name: A Day on the Lake
White Riviera House
K

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Martina is a very welcoming host with a nice and cosy place. She is flexible and happy to help. The village where the property is located,  is so calm and beautiful with easy access to Zurich downtown.
Qute and kousy. Great hospitality.
Perfect for a short-term stay in Zurich
Martina is a super host kind and friendly.
Very cosy place. Very clean and confortable. Martina was very welcoming. Can only recommend it!
The apartment was very nice, I especially loved the balcony and how clean and just generally nice the space was. Martina was very friendly and helpful, and I would highly recommend her place!!
Sehr nett und freundlich! Schöne und saubere Wohnung, gerne wieder!

Ich hatte einen Kurztrip nach Zürich für ein Bewerbungsgespräch. Die verfügbaren Hotels waren aus meiner Sicht sehr teuer und daher habe ich mich auf AirBnB nach einer günstigen Unterkunft für einen Kurzaufenthalt umgesehen. Bei Martina habe ich bekommen, was mir zugesagt wurde. Eine Luftmatratze (bequemer als gedacht), Bettzeug und ein Handtuch zum waschen und damit alles was ich brauchte. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und vom Balkon aus hatte man einen schönen Ausblick. Zusätzlich konnte ich morgens noch einen Espresso genießen. Ich habe mich in der Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt.

Da sowohl Martina und als auch ich viel unterwegs waren, haben wir uns nur einmal gesehen aber dabei ein sehr nettes Gespräch geführt und ich habe noch zwei gute Tipps für das abendliche Ausgehen von ihr bekommen.

Wallisellen ist zwar ein Stück von der Innenstadt entfernt aber sehr gut angebunden, wodurch man tatsächlich nach kurzem Fußmarsch zum Bahnhof Wallisellen in 15 Minuten entweder mitten in der Innenstadt ist oder (in die andere Richtung) am Flughafen.

Kurzum, ich war sehr zufrieden und kann sowohl den Host als auch die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen - gerne wieder!
Kommunikation war super und ohne jegliche Probleme. Alles war super, nur hat die Matratze fast den gesamten Raum ausgefüllt. Wiederkommen würde ich trotzdem :)

name: Junior Suite für 1 Person, inkl. Frühstück
Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.comments: This is a truly exceptional location and space, with fantastic service. It is almost tempting to try to keep it to myself

reviews.comments: This is a wonderful spot! Truly the location can't be beat and the space is very stylish and modern. Jacuzzi was wonderful. I would definitely stay here again.

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.comments: You are welcome to post my private comments.

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.response: Dear Michael, many thanks for sharing your feedback and comments after your stay! We will be very pleased to welcome you as our guests again, so come back at any time! All the best, James

reviews.comments: wonderful location and exceptional service

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.comments: Easy check in

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.response: Dear Kelye, thank you for your review and for staying with us! It was a pleasure hosting you. All the best, James

reviews.comments: Very expensive.  Location is great and It is the place in the pictures, but the pictures are really nice.  It has only one smallish window looking out over the square.  You have to walk up one flight of stairs with your heavy luggage before you get to the lift.  All in all for my taste it was a lot of money for what you get.  The host has a service that was responsive to our needs.  We couldn’t figure out how to get the air conditioning to work.  They sent someone fairly quickly, within an hour, to show us how to operate it.  Unfortunately you couldn’t do laundry and have the air conditioning on at the same time which was annoying.  Also there is no air conditioning outside of the bedrooms.  It’s not bad just very expensive for what you get.

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.comments: Host made us feel welcome!  Great apartment and location!  Host was very amenable to our late checkout.  Will book again.

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.response: Dear Beta, thank you for your nice review. We'll be waiting for your next booking:) All the best, James

reviews.comments:
I don't know how to start .!!! I will just say that this is THE BEST APARTMENT in ZURICH ..!!!! BY FAR..!! Everything was easy ..!! the communication fast and the UNIT huge and Spotless..!!!!!
I'm glad I did make that  choice ,  The price is NOT a reflection of the luxury that you get  once you enter to this beautiful place.

I will recommend this Apartment to anyone who likes upscale life.

Regards

Oscar

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.response:
Dear Oscar
Thank you very much for your positive review. We try to do more in the future when this apartment is being upgraded to a Le Bijou Apartment and hope to see you soon again! Just to make you curious: It will be worth visiting it again :) Cheers, James

reviews.comments:
A beautiful apartment in the TOP location in Zurich; the apartment was spacious, light and sunny, with a stunning view. We celebrated our son's wedding with a family dinner cooked and served in this well equipped apartment. It was a perfect home base where everyone could relax and have a glass of wine between events!
The host was super - very attentive and friendly. I would recommend this for a luxury business stay, a honeymoon suite or getaway, or a family apartment. Thank you!

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

reviews.comments: Fantastic.

listing.name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment

name: Director office/living 140 m2 Loft in city center
A Night on the Lake
Traditional luxury Swiss house & charming cellar

reviews.comments: This is an amazingly unique property.  We stayed here with our 2 children, ages 7 and 9, while moving into our new home in the area.  The house has plenty of space to explore, everyone was able to spread-out.  We walked into town, took advantage of a local playground and enjoyed the yard area that included a trampoline!  It is an older home, so you need to be cautious on the stairways.  Very fun mix of old and new décor.  Beds were comfortable too.  We'd recommend it to any friends and relatives that would come to visit us.

listing.name: Traditional luxury Swiss house & charming cellar

reviews.comments:
Great place with an authentic atmosphere of an old farm. Close to facilities and Zurich center. I do definitely recommend a stay there !

thank you to Amenda , regards

Nicolas

listing.name: Traditional luxury Swiss house & charming cellar

reviews.comments: The cellar is awesome!  We really enjoyed our stay and the house is an easy 40 min drive to Lucerne.  I would stay here again for sure!

listing.name: Traditional luxury Swiss house & charming cellar

reviews.comments: Very nice house with a beautiful cellar!

listing.name: Traditional luxury Swiss house & charming cellar

reviews.response: The cellar rocks :)

reviews.comments: Fancy house.

listing.name: Traditional luxury Swiss house & charming cellar

reviews.comments: A great stay in a unique house in a lovely area with plenty to explore.

name: Junior Suite für 2 Personen inkl. Frühstück
Beautiful Mansion on the lake of Zurich

reviews.comments: Superb view. Great location. Easy public transportation to Zurich and all of central Switzerland. Convenient parking.  Patrick, as host, is gracious, responsive, and very helpful with activity suggestions.

listing.name: Beautiful Mansion on the lake of Zurich

reviews.comments:
The listing oversells the place. We only had access to a few of the rooms in the house, and the only common area we had was outside.  

One of the sinks leaked and made a mess upstairs.

The owner keeps a cat in the home and didn’t tell us until the day before. One of our guests was allergic and the owner then offered to put the cat up elsewhere, but the cat was in the kitchen when we arrived and there was a sign on the door telling us to just not go in there. 

The host wasn’t ready when we arrived. The cleaning lady was supposed to let us in but she wasn’t there when we showed up. 

For the price of this place and the posting we were pretty disappointed with what we got

listing.name: Beautiful Mansion on the lake of Zurich

reviews.response:
Unfair feedback, from a bunch of  young soldiers, not used to handle a flat nor even a house, already drunk when arrived, did not read the instructions, not followig the rules, left a big mess, bottles and cans everywhere. ... no respect.
that was the fist and last time renting to them, even for this price, as its half of the  full house, exactly like in the ad.

reviews.comments: Location is cool, I would recommend a trip on the lake if the weather is good

listing.name: Beautiful Mansion on the lake of Zurich

reviews.comments:
Nice vila nice place near zurch 
Mr.bitk  was helpful

listing.name: Beautiful Mansion on the lake of Zurich

reviews.comments: Nice apartment in a villa where the owner lives with a beautiful garden which you can enter when they aren’t there. Nice location with view on the lake and some nice parks in the neighborhood.

reviews.comments: We had a very good time in Patrick's house. The view is really great and the house is spacious  and well located, not far from Zurich and the main places to visit.

listing.name: Beautiful Mansion on the lake of Zurich

reviews.comments: The house is large, upstairs is the room, downstairs is the living room and activity area. fully equipped. Easy parking. The house looked at the lake, the scenery is good. very quiet. Sir Patrick was very hospitable and gift us an Italian champagne.

name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)

reviews.comments: This is a beautiful apartment you wont regret it definitely top tier!

listing.name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)

reviews.comments: The Osterwalder penthouse ranks as one of my favorite Air B n B’s. The accommodations are truly first class from the decorating to the fantastic views.  Hosts were great at communicating quickly and having easy to understand instructions for entry access and use of the apartment.  Nice  location to access public transit.

listing.name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)

reviews.comments:
We stayed in this apartment for 28 days, family of 4 relocating from US, with two kids going to international school.

The apartment: Superb. High end appliances and kitchen, great interior design, we felt in a 5 stars luxury accommodation. Very high roof (12ft) makes you feel in a much  larger place. Super comfortable, with different living areas.

The area: Very convenient area, one stop from Airport (4 minutes), and 3 minutes walking to train station. Plenty of options for local grocery shopping, Aldi, Coop, etc. All less than 5 minutes walking. There is also a large park in front of the building. Very quiete and nice for children. 

In summary we love this place, best Airbnb stay in Europe and North America by far.

listing.name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)

reviews.comments: We had to stay for 10 days in quarantine in Switzerland. This is the best apartment to stay in !

listing.name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)

reviews.comments: This apartment is fantastic! Great views and amazing facilities. Would recommend it to anyone!

listing.name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)

reviews.comments: The apartment is absolutely gorgeous with beautiful views and being able to rent a close parking space was perfect. The apartment looks even better than on the pictures and is very well equipped. There is even a small grocery store in the building, others are a bit further away, but still in walking distance. The responsiveness and level of service from the host were outstanding and our family is looking forward to renting the apartment again when we are back in Zürich. Warmly recommended!

listing.name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)

reviews.comments:
Great place, great view, great facilities. 
Would definitely stay here again.

reviews.comments: Top

Stunning modern apartment, comfortable and design. We'll definitely be back in case of another trip to Zurich.

name: Downtown Penthouse Apartment, including Parking

reviews.comments:
This place is a gem. beautiful, clean apartment, responsive hosts, central neighborhood, a short walk from the train station and Old Town.

Would definitely return.

Great location and very nice accommodations for two families traveling together. Nice quiet building. 
Pascal was very helpful with our stay.
Upscale Airbnb. Everything is tastefully and carefully planned. Near to many restaurants, shopping and public transport. 10 mins walk to main train station. Will stay again.

The penthouse apartment is amazing! We absolutely loved our stay and recommend it to anyone. It’s centrally located, only a 10 minute pretty walk to Zurich HB train station. Very close to a lot of great shops and we would stay there again for sure.

Great location, very central to many parts of Zurich.  The apartment was extremely spacious and well laid out.  The kitchen was well stocked.  Thierry and Pascal were very responsive.  We thoroughly enjoyed the space!

Great spot, easy access, amazing tub. Had everything we needed for a business stay. Very nice and welcoming host. Easy to find, get key, and in. There is a lift. Quiet building with much around it and only a 10 minute walk to the main train station. Would indeed stay again.

Wonderful place and great location! Thierry was wonderful with allowing us to store bags both on the day of arrival and departure, which made travel easy for us! Additionally, it was very kid friendly and had some toys for the kids as well as a crib. Excellent stay!
Great place, in a wonderful location. Thierry and Pascal are very helpful and accommodating. Stay here, you will enjoy it!
Thierry has a tremendous apartment which is wonderfully located and very stylish. I particularly liked having easy off-street parking available. I look forward to staying again!
Great location. The apartment is spacious and has everything you need for your stay. I recommend staying at Thierry’s place.

name: 2 Bedroom Superior Penthouse Apartment, Seefeld

reviews.comments: Great space in a great location and the team was very communicative to coordinate the stay.
reviews.response:
Dear Nelson
Thank you for your fedback and we hope to welcome you on another time in Zurich.

reviews.comments: Great location, super clean and the apartment functioned well for a week long stay in Zurich.  We loved the 3 times a week housekeeping service too.  We would rent again if we visit the city - our daughter lives nearby.
reviews.response:
Dear Tanya
Thank you for your kind feedback and we hope to welcome you again during your next time in Zurich.

reviews.comments: Great apartments in a great location, everything about the apartment itself was perfect except two items, I had a large SUV with me and the parking spot I was initially offered wasn’t large enough for the car and I had to switch to street parking. Finding parking at certain hours was super difficult and I even ended up got a parking ticket because I hadn’t filled out the street parking permit correctly… other issue was that the elevator on the property was suuper tiny…it barely fits one adult and to get to the elevator you have to climb 6-7 stairs, this was particularly challenging when I wanted to take my luggage to the unit which was on the 5th floor. It was unfortunate that this situation was not correctly communicated to me when I had asked about the elevator at the time of booking.
reviews.response:
Dear Aria
Thank you for your warm words and your feedback.
We are sorry to hear, that you had some struggle with the luggage and also to find a parking slot.
We will also teach our agents to communicate this cases a better way - thank you again for your feedback. This helps us to let our guests feel comfortable.

reviews.comments: This apartment is in a wonderful location — it is very close to plenty of restaurants and shops and only a 15 minute walk to everything you could want in Old Town. There is also a great park very close and the lake is two blocks away. The hosts are very communicative and helpful and the apartment was clean and well equipped. A great place to stay!
reviews.response:
Dear Taryn
Thank you for your kind feedback and it is a pleasure to hear that you had a wonderful time in Switzerland.
We would be pleased to welcome you again as our guest at EMA House Serviced Apartments.

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our stay. The apartment is in a great location and very well appointed.
Great spot and view. Comfortable. Would recommend.
reviews.response: Dear Annie, Thank you for your mail and your feedback. We would be pleased to welcome you again as our guest at EMA House.

reviews.comments: Great stay! Thanks for the excellent service!
reviews.response:
Dear Monika
Thank you for your feedback and we are looking forward to welcome you on another time at EMA House.

reviews.comments: Loved our stay. It was the perfect accommodation in the perfect location. Very clean and well kept. Will definitely be back on our next trip back to Zurich!

Best regards
